name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル3

description: Level 3 of Impel Down prison, known as Starvation Hell. This episode focuses on the entrance area between Level 3 and upper levels where Hannyabal confronts the escapees and Blackbeard makes his appearance.

keyEvents.title: Hannyabal Confronts the Escapees at Level 3 Entrance
keyEvents.description: Hannyabal emerges from the Level 3 door to confront Luffy and the escaped prisoners, engaging in combat despite being outmatched.
keyEvents.significance: The location where one of the arc's most important moral moments occurs with Hannyabal's justice speech.

keyEvents.title: Hannyabal's Justice Speech
keyEvents.description: At this location, Hannyabal delivers his powerful speech about protecting innocent citizens from pirates and the purpose of Impel Down.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most morally complex moments in the series occurs at this location.

keyEvents.title: Blackbeard Arrives at Level 3
keyEvents.description: Blackbeard makes his appearance at the Level 3 entrance, crushing Hannyabal and confronting Luffy for the first time since Jaya.
keyEvents.significance: The location of the first direct confrontation between Luffy and Blackbeard since Episode 146.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Blackbeard Begins
keyEvents.description: Luffy strikes Blackbeard with Jet Pistol at this location, beginning their first true combat.
keyEvents.significance: The starting point of one of the series' most important rivalries.

statusHistory.reason: Operational prison level during the Impel Down arc
